location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paper.Dimensions: 139 x 253mm, on sheet 240 x 330mm.

mods.abstract: Plan of Doha harbour. The plan indicates roads and settlements, and provides some indication of relief in the form of hachures. Includes the following printing statement: 'Produced under the Superintendence of Rear-Admiral J.A. Edgell, C.B., O.B.E., Hydrographer.'Prepared by naval staff in the Admiralty's Naval Intelligence Division.
